A

acceptMessage(AMessage) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasWorldEnv
Process a message received by the BFinder agent, by returning an appropriate answer.
addBarcenasHereClauses(int, int) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
When sound sensor gathers sound in all possible positions that means Barcenas is as that certain current position.
addCoordToFormula(int, int, int, int) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
 
addImplicationToFormula(int, int) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Adds the implication: firstPart -> secondPart to formula.
addLastFutureClausesToPastClauses() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Adds all the clauses stored in the list futureToPast to the formula stored in solver.
addSoundSensorEvidence(int, int, String) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Adds the information obtained with the sound sensor as appropriate clauses to the formula of the agent (stored in solver).
agentX - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Agent position in the world.
agentY - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Agent position in the world.
AMessage - Class in apryraz.bworld
Class for representing messages exchanged between agents and the World interface object.
AMessage(String, String, String) - Constructor for class apryraz.bworld.AMessage
Class constructor.
apryraz.bworld - package apryraz.bworld
This package contains an implementation of the Barcenas World, where an agent has to find the location of Barcenas using different sensors to get information about the world.

B

BarcenasFinder - Class in apryraz.bworld
This agent performs a sequence of movements, and after each movement it "senses" from the environment the resulting position and then the outcome from the smell sensor, to try to locate the position of Barcenas.
BarcenasFinder(int) - Constructor for class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
The class constructor must create the initial Boolean formula with the rules of the Barcenas World, initialize the variables for indicating that we do not have yet any movements to perform, make the initial state.
barcenasFutureOffset - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
First ever literal in future variables concerning information about Barcenas' location.
barcenasPastOffset - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
First ever literal in past variables concerning information about Barcenas' location.
BarcenasWorld - Class in apryraz.bworld
The class for the main program of the Barcenas World.
BarcenasWorld() - Constructor for class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasWorld
 
BarcenasWorldEnv - Class in apryraz.bworld
 
BarcenasWorldEnv(int, int, int) - Constructor for class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasWorldEnv
Class constructor.
BarcenasX - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasWorldEnv
X,Y position of Barcenas and world dimension.
BarcenasY - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasWorldEnv
X,Y position of Barcenas and world dimension.
bfstate - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Current state of knowledge of the agent (what it knows about every position of the world).
BFState - Class in apryraz.bworld
Class for representing the Barcenas Finder problem using a canvas and a visual interface.
BFState(int) - Constructor for class apryraz.bworld.BFState
Class constructor.
buildGamma() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Builds the initial logical formula of the agent and stores it into the solver object.

C

coordToLineal(int, int, int) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Converts a coordinate pair (x,y) to the integer value b_[x,y] of variable that stores that information in the formula, using offset as the initial index for that subset of position variables (past and future position variables have different variables, so different offset values).
currentLiteral - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
First ever literal without meaning, free to assign.

E

envAgent - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Object that represents the interface for the Barcenas World.
equals(Object) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BFState
Compares two BFS states (Barcenas world states), that means two matrixes and its cells.

F

futureBarcenas() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Adds the clause that says that Barcenas must be in some position with respect to the variables that talk about future positions.
futureToPast - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Array of clauses that represent conclusions obtained in the most recent call to the inference function, but rewritten using the "past" variables.

G

getComp(int) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.AMessage
Gets some part of the message.
getState() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Returns the current state of the agent.

I

idNextStep - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Index for the next movement to perform, and total number of movements.
initializeState() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BFState
Initializes the matrix representing the state of the 'Barcenas World'.
insertSoundAboveImplications(int, int) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Adds to formula the clauses related to implications between the sound sensor and not possible positions of Barcenas when the sound is heard above.
insertSoundBelowImplications(int, int) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Adds to formula the clauses related to implications between the sound sensor and not possible positions of Barcenas when the sound is heard below.
insertSoundLeftImplications(int, int) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Adds to formula the clauses related to implications between the sound sensor and not possible positions of Barcenas when the sound is heard on the left.
insertSoundRightImplications(int, int) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Adds to formula the clauses related to implications between the sound sensor and not possible positions of Barcenas when the sound is heard on the right.

L

linealToCoord(int, int) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Performs the inverse computation of the previous function.
listOfSteps - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
List of steps to perform.
loadListOfSteps(int, String) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Loads a sequence of steps to be performed by the agent.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasWorld
Loads five arguments from the command line: arg[0] = dimension of the word.
matrix - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BFState
Matrix representing a visual approach for the Barcenas Finder problem and the current state of the problem.
moveTo(int, int) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Uses agent "actuators" to move to (x,y) We simulate this by letting the World Agent (environment) know that we want to move, but we need the answer from it to be sure that the movement was successfully made.
moveToNext() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Asks the agent to move to the next position, by sending an appropriate message to the environment object.
msg - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.AMessage
 

N

notInFirstPosition() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Adds the clauses that say that Barcenas can never (past and future) be in the first position.
numMovements - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Index for the next movement to perform, and total number of movements.

P

pastBarcenas() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Adds the clause that says that Barcenas must be in some position with respect to the variables that talk about past positions.
pastBarcenasToFutureBarcenas() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Adds the clauses that say that if in the past we reached the conclusion that Barcenas cannot be in a position (x,y), then this should be also true in the future.
performInferenceQuestions() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Checks, using the future variables related to possible positions of Barcenas, whether it is a logical consequence that Barcenas is NOT at certain positions.
Position - Class in apryraz.bworld
Class to represent a position or coordinate (x,y).
Position(int, int) - Constructor for class apryraz.bworld.Position
Class constructor.
printState() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BFState
Prints Barcenas world matrix.
processMoveAnswer(AMessage) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Processes the answer obtained from the environment when asked to perform a movement
processSoundSensorAnswer(AMessage) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Processes the answer obtained for the query "Is there any sound at (agentX,agentY)?" by adding the appropriate evidence clause/s to the formula and then performing the inference questions to discover new positions where Barcenas is NOT located.

R

returnBarcenasDirection(int, int) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasWorldEnv
Returns which way or ways Barcenas is located according to given arguments (x,y):
runNextStep() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Executes the next step in the sequence of steps of the agent, and then uses the agent sensors to get information from the environment.
runStepsSequence(int, int, int, int, String) - Static method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasWorld
Executes the sequence of steps stored in the file fileSteps, but only up to numSteps steps.

S

set(int, int, String) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BFState
Sets a cell to the specified value.
setEnvironment(BarcenasWorldEnv) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Stores a reference to the Environment Object that will be used by the agent to interact with the BarcenasWorld class, by sending messages and getting answers for them.
showMessage() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.AMessage
Shows message on screen.
solver - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
SAT solver object that stores the logical boolean formula with the rules and current knowledge about not possible locations for Barcenas.
soundAboveOffset - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
First ever literal in present variables related to when sound is gathered above a certain position by the sound sensors.
soundBelowOffset - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
First ever literal in present variables related to when sound is gathered below a certain position by the sound sensors.
soundImplications() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Adds the clauses related to implications between sound sensor evidence and not possible positions of Barcenas.
soundLeftOffset - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
First ever literal in present variables related to when sound is gathered on the left of a certain position by the sound sensors.
soundRightOffset - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
First ever literal in present variables related to when sound is gathered on the right a certain position by the sound sensors.
soundsAt() - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Sends to the environment object the question: "Is there any sound at (agentX,agentY) ?".

W

wDim - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BFState
World dimension, that means as many rows as wDim and as many columns as wDim.
withinLimits(int, int) - Method in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasWorldEnv
Check if position x,y is within the limits of the WorldDim x WorldDim world.
worldDim - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Dimension of the world and total size of the world (Dim^2).
WorldDim - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasWorldEnv
X,Y position of Barcenas and world dimension.
worldLinealDim - Variable in class apryraz.bworld.BarcenasFinder
Dimension of the world and total size of the world (Dim^2).
